comprehensive_overview: Mentor Graphics, a Siemens business, is a US-based electronic design automation (EDA) company providing software and hardware design solutions that enable companies to develop better electronic products faster and more cost-effectively.
core_features: Key features of Mentor Graphics include design automation software for integrated circuits (ICs), printed circuit boards (PCBs), FPGA design, automotive electronic systems, embedded software, and hardware/software co-verification. They also offer simulation and verification tools, design for manufacturability solutions, and thermal analysis software.
